title: Chicken curry
content:
Chicken curry is fast and delicious weeknight dish. You can easily adjust spiciness level. It has well balanced flavours. 

Ingredients:

  • Chicken breast 500g
  • Canned Tomatoes 1 400g can
  • Ginger
  • Yellow onion
  • Garlic
  • Garam masala spice mix
  • Basmati rice
  • Fresh coliander, lemon for garnishing

Instructions:

  1. Slice the chicken to pieces, marinate it in garam masala.
  2. Grate ginger and garlic. Cut inion into cubes.
  3. Fry chicken, add onion, ginger and garlic paste.
  4. Put in the tomatoes. Cook for 20 minutes.
  5. In meantime boil rice.
  6. Serve with rice, garnish with lemon and cilantro.
